item.title: Kubectl常用命令汇总
item.description: 从容器中拷贝文件 1 kubectl cp -n namespace pod_name:app/test.txt ./test.txt 查看pod详情 1 kubectl describe pods -n namespace 删除节点 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 #先停止服务 systemctl stop docker systemctl stop kubelet kubectl delete node node_name 删除pod 1 2 3 4 kubectl delete pod pod_name -n namespace 强制删除 kubectl delete pod pod_name -n namespace --grace-period=0 --force 回滚 kubectl rollout history deployment/grafana -n kubesphere-monitoring-system kubectl rollout history deployment/grafana --revision=83 -n kubesphere-monitoring-system kubectl rollout undo deployment/grafana --to-revision=1 -n kubesphere-monitoring-system
